meanings.definition: Not causing or accompanied by earthquakes.
meanings.sent1: The aseismic region remained undisturbed by any tremors.
meanings.sent2: The building was designed to be aseismic to ensure safety during earthquakes.
meanings.sent3: The aseismic ground was so still, even the ants didn't feel like dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was as aseismic as the untouched surface of a serene lake.
meanings.sent5: The aseismic landscape was like a sleeping giant, unmoved by the chaos around it.

meanings.sent1: The aseismic structure stood strong against the shaking ground.
meanings.sent2: The aseismic material was chosen for its ability to withstand earthquakes.
meanings.sent3: The aseismic building was the envy of all the other structures in town.
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as aseismic as a mountain, unyielding to any challenges.
meanings.sent5: The aseismic foundation of their friendship kept them steady through turbulent times.
